00020 =head1 NAME
00021 
00022 WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::Stats - Display statistics by user or
00023 problem set.

00027 use strict;
00028 use warnings;
00029 #use CGI qw(-nosticky );
00030 use WeBWorK::CGI;
00031 use WeBWorK::Debug;
00032 use WeBWorK::Utils qw(readDirectory list2hash max);
00033 use WeBWorK::Localize;
00034 sub initialize {
00035     my ($self) = @_;
00036     my $r = $self->r;
00037     my $db = $r->db;
00038     my $ce = $r->ce;
00039     my $authz = $r->authz;
00040     
00041     my $userName = $r->param('user');
00042     my $effectiveUserName = defined($r->param("effectiveUser") ) ? $r->param("effectiveUser") : $userName;
00043     $self->{userName} = $userName;
00044     $self->{studentName} = $effectiveUserName;
00045 }
00046 
00047 sub body {
00048     my ($self) = @_;
00049     
00050     $self->displayStudentStats($self->{studentName});
00051     
00052     print $self->scoring_info();
00053     
00054     return '';
00055 
00056 }
00057 
00058 ############################################
00059 # Borrowed from SendMail.pm and Instructor.pm
00060 ############################################
00061 
00062 sub getRecord {
00063     my $self    = shift;
00064     my $line    = shift;
00065     my $delimiter   = shift;
00066     $delimiter       = ',' unless defined($delimiter);
00067 
00068         #       Takes a delimited line as a parameter and returns an
00069         #       array.  Note that all white space is removed.  If the
00070         #       last field is empty, the last element of the returned
00071         #       array is also empty (unlike what the perl split command
00072         #       would return).  E.G. @lineArray=&getRecord(\$delimitedLine).
00073 
00074         my(@lineArray);
00075         $line.=$delimiter;                              # add 'A' to end of line so that
00076                                                         # last field is never empty
00077         @lineArray = split(/\s*${delimiter}\s*/,$line);
00078         $lineArray[0] =~s/^\s*// if defined($lineArray[0]);                       # remove white space from first element
00079         @lineArray;
00080 }
00081 
00082 sub scoring_info {
00083     my ($self) = @_;
00084     my $r = $self->r;
00085     my $db = $r->db;
00086     my $ce = $r->ce;
00087     
00088     my $userName          = $r->param('effectiveUser') || $r->param('user');
00089     my $userID              = $r->param('user');
00090     my $ur                = $db->getUser($userName);
00091     my $emailDirectory    = $ce->{courseDirs}->{email};
00092     my $filePath          = "$emailDirectory/report_grades.msg";
00093     my $merge_file         = "report_grades_data.csv";
00094     my $delimiter            = ',';
00095     my $scoringDirectory    = $ce->{courseDirs}->{scoring};
00096     return "There is no additional grade information. The spreadsheet file $filePath cannot be found." unless -e "$scoringDirectory/$merge_file";
00097     my $rh_merge_data   = $self->read_scoring_file("$merge_file", "$delimiter");
00098     my $text;
00099     my $header = '';
00100     local(*FILE);
00101     if (-e "$filePath" and -r "$filePath") {
00102         open FILE, "$filePath" || return("Can't open $filePath"); 
00103         while ($header !~ s/Message:\s*$//m and not eof(FILE)) { 
00104             $header .= <FILE>; 
00105         }
00106     } else {
00107         return("There is no additional grade information. <br> The message file $filePath cannot be found.")
00108     }
00109     $text = join( '', <FILE>);
00110     close(FILE);
00111     
00112     my $status_name = $ce->status_abbrev_to_name($ur->status);
00113     $status_name = $ur->status unless defined $status_name;
00114     
00115     my $SID           = $ur->student_id;
00116     my $FN            = $ur->first_name;
00117     my $LN            = $ur->last_name;
00118     my $SECTION       = $ur->section;
00119     my $RECITATION    = $ur->recitation;
00120     my $STATUS        = $status_name;
00121     my $EMAIL         = $ur->email_address;
00122     my $LOGIN         = $ur->user_id;
00123     my @COL           = defined($rh_merge_data->{$SID}) ? @{$rh_merge_data->{$SID} } : ();
00124     unshift(@COL,"");           ## this makes COL[1] the first column
00125 
00126     my $endCol        = @COL;
00127     # for safety, only evaluate special variables
00128     # FIXME /e is not required for simple variable interpolation
00129     my $msg = $text; 
00130     $msg =~ s/(\$PAR)/<p>/ge;
00131     $msg =~ s/(\$BR)/<br>/ge;
00132    
00133     $msg =~ s/\$SID/$SID/ge;
00134     $msg =~ s/\$LN/$LN/ge;
00135     $msg =~ s/\$FN/$FN/ge;
00136     $msg =~ s/\$STATUS/$STATUS/ge;
00137     $msg =~ s/\$SECTION/$SECTION/ge;
00138     $msg =~ s/\$RECITATION/$RECITATION/ge;
00139     $msg =~ s/\$EMAIL/$EMAIL/ge;
00140     $msg =~ s/\$LOGIN/$LOGIN/ge;
00141     if (defined($COL[1])) {     # prevents extraneous error messages.  
00142         $msg =~ s/\$COL\[(\-?\d+)\]/$COL[$1] if defined($COL[$1])/ge
00143     }
00144     else {                      # prevents extraneous $COL's in email message 
00145         $msg =~ s/\$COL\[(\-?\d+)\]//g
00146     }
00147     
00148 #   old version 
00149 #   $msg =~ s/(\$SID)/eval($1)/ge;
00150 #   $msg =~ s/(\$LN)/eval($1)/ge;
00151 #   $msg =~ s/(\$FN)/eval($1)/ge;
00152 #   $msg =~ s/(\$STATUS)/eval($1)/ge;
00153 #   $msg =~ s/(\$SECTION)/eval($1)/ge;
00154 #   $msg =~ s/(\$RECITATION)/eval($1)/ge;
00155 #   $msg =~ s/(\$EMAIL)/eval($1)/ge;
00156 #   $msg =~ s/(\$LOGIN)/eval($1)/ge;
00157 #   $msg =~ s/\$COL\[ *-/\$COL\[$endCol-/g;
00158 #   $msg =~ s/(\$COL\[.*?\])/eval($1)/ge;
00159     
00160     $msg =~ s/\r//g;
00161     $msg = "<pre>$msg</pre>";
00162     $msg = qq!More scoring information goes here in [TMPL]/email/report_grades.msg. It
00163         is merged with the file [Scoring]/report_grades_data.csv. <br>These files can be edited 
00164         using the "Email" link and the "Scoring Tools" link in the left margin.<p>!.$msg if ($r->authz->hasPermissions($userID, "access_instructor_tools"));
00165     return CGI::div(
00166         {style =>"background-color:#DDDDDD"}, $msg
00167     );
00168 }
00169 
00170 sub displayStudentStats {
00171     my ($self, $studentName) = @_;
00172     my $r = $self->r;
00173     my $db = $r->db;
00174     my $ce = $r->ce;
00175     my $authz = $r->authz;
00176     
00177     my $courseName = $ce->{courseName};
00178     my $studentRecord = $db->getUser($studentName); # checked
00179     die "record for user $studentName not found" unless $studentRecord;
00180     my $root = $ce->{webworkURLs}->{root};
00181 
00182 ######################################################################
00183 # Get all sets (including versions of gateway quizzes) assigned to this user
00184 ######################################################################
00185 
00186     # first get all non-versioned-sets; listUserSets will return all 
00187     #    homework assignments, plus the template gateway sets.
00188     # DBFIXME use iterator instead of setIDs
00189     my @setIDs    = sort( $db->listUserSets($studentName) );
00190     # to figure out which of these are gateways (that is, versioned),
00191     #    we need to also have the actual (merged) set objects
00192     my @sets = $db->getMergedSets( map {[$studentName, $_]} @setIDs );
00193     # to be able to find the set objects later, make a handy hash
00194     my %setsByID = ( map {$_->set_id => $_} @sets );
00195 
00196 ######################################################
00197 # before going through the table generating loop, find all the 
00198 #    set versions for the sets in our list
00199 #
00200 # info for refactoring:
00201 # input:  list of regular sets (from $db->getMergedSets(studentID, setID )
00202 # input:  $db
00203 # input: \%setsByID
00204 # output: \%setVersionsByID  ---  a pointer to a list of version names.
00205 # update: \%setsByID ---  indexed by full set name, value is the set record
00206 # output: \@allSetIDs   -- full names of sets (the gateway template and the versioned tests)
00207 #############################################
00208     my %setVersionsByID = ();
00209     my @allSetIDs = ();
00210     foreach my $set ( @sets ) {
00211         my $setName = $set->set_id();
00212         #
00213         # FIXME: Here, as in many other locations, we assume that
00214         #    there is a one-to-one matching between versioned sets
00215         #    and gateways.  we really should have two flags, 
00216         #    $set->assignment_type and $set->versioned.  I'm not 
00217         #    adding that yet, however, so this will continue to 
00218         #    use assignment_type...
00219         #
00220         if ( defined($set->assignment_type) && 
00221              $set->assignment_type =~ /gateway/ ) { 
00222             my @vList = $db->listSetVersions($studentName,$setName);
00223             # we have to have the merged set versions to 
00224             #    know what each of their assignment types 
00225             #    are (because proctoring can change)
00226             my @setVersions = $db->getMergedSetVersions( map {[$studentName, $setName, $_]} @vList );
00227 
00228             # add the set versions to our list of sets
00229             foreach ( @setVersions ) { 
00230                 $setsByID{$_->set_id . ",v" . $_->version_id} = $_; 
00231             }
00232             # flag the existence of set versions for this set
00233             $setVersionsByID{$setName} = [ @vList ];
00234             # and save the set names for display
00235             push( @allSetIDs, $setName );
00236             push( @allSetIDs, map { "$setName,v$_" } @vList );
00237 
00238         } else {
00239             push( @allSetIDs, $setName );
00240             $setVersionsByID{$setName} = "None";
00241         }
00242     }
00243     
00244 
00245 #########################################################################################
00246     my $fullName = join("", $studentRecord->first_name," ", $studentRecord->last_name);
00247     my $effectiveUser = $studentRecord->user_id();
00248     my $act_as_student_url = "$root/$courseName/?user=".$r->param("user").
00249             "&effectiveUser=$effectiveUser&key=".$r->param("key");
00250 
00251     
00252     # FIXME: why is the following not "print CGI::h3($fullName);"?  Hmm.
00253     print CGI::h3($fullName ), 
00254 
00255     ###############################################################
00256     #  Print table
00257     ###############################################################
00258 
00259     # FIXME I'm assuming the problems are all the same
00260     # FIXME what does this mean?
00261     
00262     my @rows;
00263     my $max_problems=0;
00264     
00265     foreach my $setName (@allSetIDs)   {
00266         my $act_as_student_set_url = "$root/$courseName/$setName/?user=".$r->param("user").
00267             "&effectiveUser=$effectiveUser&key=".$r->param("key");
00268         my $set = $setsByID{ $setName };
00269         my $setID = $set->set_id();  #FIXME   setName and setID should be the same
00270 
00271         # now, if the set is a template gateway set and there 
00272         #    are no versions, we acknowledge that the set exists
00273         #    and the student hasn't attempted it; otherwise, we 
00274         #    skip it and let the versions speak for themselves
00275         if ( defined( $set->assignment_type() ) &&
00276              $set->assignment_type() =~ /gateway/ &&
00277              ref( $setVersionsByID{ $setName } ) ) {
00278             if ( @{$setVersionsByID{$setName}} ) {
00279                 next;
00280             } else {
00281                 push( @rows, CGI::Tr({}, CGI::td(WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::underscore2nbsp($setID)), 
00282                              CGI::td({colspan=>4}, CGI::em("No versions of this assignment have been taken."))) );
00283                 next;
00284             }
00285         }
00286         # if the set has hide_score set, then we need to skip printing
00287         #    the score as well
00288         if ( defined( $set->hide_score ) &&
00289              ( ! $authz->hasPermissions($r->param("user"), "view_hidden_work") &&
00290                ( $set->hide_score eq 'Y' || 
00291              ($set->hide_score eq 'BeforeAnswerDate' && time < $set->answer_date) ) ) ) {
00292             push( @rows, CGI::Tr({}, CGI::td(WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::underscore2nbsp("${setID}_(test_" . $set->version_id . ")")), 
00293                          CGI::td({colspan=>4}, CGI::em("Display of scores for this set is not allowed."))) );
00294             next;
00295         }
00296 
00297         # otherwise, if it's a gateway, adjust the act-as url
00298         my $setIsVersioned = 0;
00299         if ( defined( $set->assignment_type() ) && 
00300              $set->assignment_type() =~ /gateway/ ) {
00301             $setIsVersioned = 1;
00302             if ( $set->assignment_type() eq 'proctored_gateway' ) {
00303                 $act_as_student_set_url =~ s/($courseName)\//$1\/proctored_quiz_mode\//;
00304             } else {
00305                 $act_as_student_set_url =~ s/($courseName)\//$1\/quiz_mode\//;
00306             }
00307         }
00308        ##############################################
00309        # this segment requires @problemRecords, $db, $set
00310        # and $studentName, $setName, 
00311        ##############################################
00312        my ($status, 
00313            $longStatus, 
00314            $string,
00315            $twoString, 
00316            $totalRight,
00317            $total, 
00318            $num_of_attempts, 
00319            $num_of_problems);
00320            
00321           ($status, 
00322            $longStatus, 
00323            $string,
00324            $twoString, 
00325            $totalRight,
00326            $total, 
00327            $num_of_attempts, 
00328            $num_of_problems
00329            )   = grade_set( $db, $set, $setName, $studentName, $setIsVersioned);
00330 
00331 #       warn "status $status  longStatus $longStatus string $string twoString 
00332 #             $twoString totalRight $totalRight, total $total num_of_attempts $num_of_attempts 
00333 #             num_of_problems $num_of_problems setName $setName";
00334 
00335         my $avg_num_attempts = ($num_of_problems) ? $num_of_attempts/$num_of_problems : 0;
00336         my $successIndicator = ($avg_num_attempts && $total) ? ($totalRight/$total)**2/$avg_num_attempts : 0 ;
00337         
00338         $max_problems = ($max_problems<$num_of_problems)? $num_of_problems:$max_problems;
00339         
00340         # prettify versioned set display
00341         $setName =~ s/(.+),v(\d+)$/${1}_(test_$2)/;
00342     
00343         push @rows, CGI::Tr({},
00344             CGI::td(CGI::a({-href=>$act_as_student_set_url}, WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::underscore2nbsp($setName))),
00345             CGI::td(sprintf("%0.2f",$totalRight)), # score
00346             CGI::td($total), # out of 
00347             #CGI::td(sprintf("%0.0f",100*$successIndicator)),   # indicator -- leave this out
00348             CGI::td("<pre>$string\n$twoString</pre>"), # problems
00349             #CGI::td($studentRecord->section),
00350             #CGI::td($studentRecord->recitation),
00351             #CGI::td($studentRecord->user_id),          
00352             
00353         );
00354     
00355     }
00356 
00357     my $problem_header = "";
00358     foreach (1 .. $max_problems) {
00359         $problem_header .= &threeSpaceFill($_);
00360     }
00361     
00362     my $table_header = join("\n",
00363         CGI::start_table({-border=>5,style=>'font-size:smaller',-id=>"grades_table"}),
00364         CGI::Tr({},
00365             CGI::th({ -align=>'center',},'Set'),
00366             CGI::th({ -align=>'center', },'Score'),
00367             CGI::th({ -align=>'center', },'Out'.CGI::br().'Of'),
00368             #CGI::th({ -align=>'center', },'Ind'),  #  -- leave out indicator column
00369             CGI::th({ -align=>'center', },'Problems'.CGI::br().CGI::pre($problem_header)),
00370             #CGI::th({ -align=>'center', },'Section'),
00371             #CGI::th({ -align=>'center', },'Recitation'),
00372             #CGI::th({ -align=>'center', },'login_name'),
00373             #CGI::th({ -align=>'center', },'ID'),
00374         )
00375     );
00376     
00377 
00378     
00379     print $table_header;
00380     print @rows;
00381     print CGI::end_table();
00382             
00383     return "";
00384 }
00385 ################
00386 # TASKS
00387 ###################
00388 
00389 #  grading utility
00390 # provides a formatted line for presenting grades (
00391 ###############################################################
00392 # 17-2-motion-velocity  0.00    7   0   .  .  .  .  .  .  .  
00393 #                                        0  0  0  0  0  0  0  
00394 ###############################################################
00395 # requires = grade_set( $db, $set, $setName, $studentName, $setIsVersioned);
00396 # returns   my ($status, 
00397 #            $longStatus, 
00398 #            $string,
00399 #            $twoString, 
00400 #            $totalRight,
00401 #            $total, 
00402 #            $num_of_attempts, 
00403 #            $num_of_problems) = grade_set(...);
00404 #########################
00405 #           ########################################
00406 #           # Notes for factoring the calculation in this loop.
00407 #           #
00408 #           # Inputs include:
00409 #           #   @problemRecords  
00410 #           # returns
00411 #           #   $num_of_attempts
00412 #           #   $status
00413 #           # updates
00414 #           #   $number_of_students_attempting_problem{$probID}++;
00415 #           #   @{ $attempts_list_for_problem{$probID} }   
00416 #           #   $number_of_attempts_for_problem{$probID}
00417 #           #   $total_num_of_attempts_for_set
00418 #           #   $correct_answers_for_problem{$probID}   
00419 #           #    
00420 #           #   $string (formatting output)
00421 #           #   $twoString (more formatted output)
00422 #           #   $longtwo (a combination of $string and $twostring)
00423 #           #   $total
00424 #           #   $totalRight
00425 #           ###################################
00426 sub grade_set {
00427         
00428         my ($db, $set, $setName, $studentName, $setIsVersioned) = @_;
00429 
00430         my $setID = $set->set_id();  #FIXME   setName and setID should be the same
00431 
00432         my $status = 0;
00433         my $longStatus = '';
00434         my $string     = '';
00435         my $twoString  = '';
00436         my $totalRight = 0;
00437         my $total      = 0;
00438         my $num_of_attempts = 0;
00439     
00440         debug("Begin collecting problems for set $setName");
00441         # DBFIXME: to collect the problem records, we have to know 
00442         #    which merge routines to call.  Should this really be an 
00443         #    issue here?  That is, shouldn't the database deal with 
00444         #    it invisibly by detecting what the problem types are?  
00445         #    oh well.
00446         
00447         my @problemRecords = $db->getAllMergedUserProblems( $studentName, $setID );
00448         my $num_of_problems  = @problemRecords || 0;
00449         my $max_problems     = defined($num_of_problems) ? $num_of_problems : 0; 
00450 
00451         if ( $setIsVersioned ) {
00452             @problemRecords = $db->getAllMergedProblemVersions( $studentName, $setID, $set->version_id );
00453         }   # use versioned problems instead (assume that each version has the same number of problems.
00454         
00455         debug("End collecting problems for set $setName");
00456 
00457     ####################
00458     # Resort records
00459     #####################
00460         @problemRecords = sort {$a->problem_id <=> $b->problem_id }  @problemRecords;
00461         
00462         # for gateway/quiz assignments we have to be careful about 
00463         #    the order in which the problems are displayed, because
00464         #    they may be in a random order
00465         if ( $set->problem_randorder ) {
00466             my @newOrder = ();
00467             my @probOrder = (0..$#problemRecords);
00468             # we reorder using a pgrand based on the set psvn
00469             my $pgrand = PGrandom->new();
00470             $pgrand->srand( $set->psvn );
00471             while ( @probOrder ) { 
00472                 my $i = int($pgrand->rand(scalar(@probOrder)));
00473                 push( @newOrder, $probOrder[$i] );
00474                 splice(@probOrder, $i, 1);
00475             }
00476             # now $newOrder[i] = pNum-1, where pNum is the problem
00477             #    number to display in the ith position on the test
00478             #    for sorting, invert this mapping:
00479             my %pSort = map {($newOrder[$_]+1)=>$_} (0..$#newOrder);
00480 
00481             @problemRecords = sort {$pSort{$a->problem_id} <=> $pSort{$b->problem_id}} @problemRecords;
00482         }
00483         
00484         
00485     #######################################################
00486     # construct header
00487     
00488         foreach my $problemRecord (@problemRecords) {
00489             my $prob = $problemRecord->problem_id;
00490             
00491             unless (defined($problemRecord) ){
00492                 # warn "Can't find record for problem $prob in set $setName for $student";
00493                 # FIXME check the legitimate reasons why a student record might not be defined
00494                 next;
00495             }
00496             
00497             $status           = $problemRecord->status || 0;
00498             my  $attempted    = $problemRecord->attempted;
00499             my $num_correct   = $problemRecord->num_correct || 0;
00500             my $num_incorrect = $problemRecord->num_incorrect   || 0;
00501             $num_of_attempts  += $num_correct + $num_incorrect;
00502 
00503 #######################################################
00504             # This is a fail safe mechanism that makes sure that
00505             # the problem is marked as attempted if the status has
00506             # been set or if the problem has been attempted
00507             # DBFIXME this should happen in the database layer, not here!
00508             if (!$attempted && ($status || $num_of_attempts)) {
00509                 $attempted = 1;
00510                 $problemRecord->attempted('1');
00511                 # DBFIXME: this is another case where it 
00512                 #    seems we shouldn't have to check for 
00513                 #    which routine to use here...
00514                 if ( $setIsVersioned ) {
00515                     $db->putProblemVersion($problemRecord);
00516                 } else {
00517                     $db->putUserProblem($problemRecord );
00518                 }
00519             }
00520 ######################################################          
00521 
00522             # sanity check that the status (score) is 
00523             # between 0 and 1
00524             my $valid_status = ($status>=0 && $status<=1)?1:0;
00525 
00526             ###########################################
00527             # Determine the string $longStatus which 
00528             # will display the student's current score
00529             ###########################################         
00530 
00531             if (!$attempted){
00532                 $longStatus     = '.';
00533             } elsif   ($valid_status) {
00534                 $longStatus     = int(100*$status+.5);
00535                 $longStatus='C' if ($longStatus==100);
00536             } else  {
00537                 $longStatus     = 'X';
00538             }
00539 
00540             $string          .= threeSpaceFill($longStatus);
00541             $twoString       .= threeSpaceFill($num_incorrect);
00542             my $probValue     = $problemRecord->value;
00543             $probValue        = 1 unless defined($probValue) and $probValue ne "";  # FIXME?? set defaults here?
00544             $total           += $probValue;
00545             $totalRight      += round_score($status*$probValue) if $valid_status;
00546             
00547 #               
00548 #           # initialize the number of correct answers 
00549 #           # for this problem if the value has not been 
00550 #           # defined.
00551 #           $correct_answers_for_problem{$probID} = 0 
00552 #               unless defined($correct_answers_for_problem{$probID});
00553             
00554 #               
00555 #       # add on the scores for this problem
00556 #           if (defined($attempted) and $attempted) {
00557 #               $number_of_students_attempting_problem{$probID}++;
00558 #               push( @{ $attempts_list_for_problem{$probID} } ,     $num_of_attempts);
00559 #               $number_of_attempts_for_problem{$probID}             += $num_of_attempts;
00560 #               $h_problemData{$probID}                               = $num_incorrect;
00561 #               $total_num_of_attempts_for_set                       += $num_of_attempts;
00562 #               $correct_answers_for_problem{$probID}                += $status;
00563 #           }
00564 
00565         }  # end of problem record loop
00566 
00567 
00568 
00569         return($status,  
00570                $longStatus, 
00571                $string,
00572                $twoString, 
00573                $totalRight,
00574                $total, 
00575                $num_of_attempts, 
00576                $num_of_problems         
00577         );
00578 }
00579 #################################
00580 # Utility function NOT a method
00581 #################################
00582 sub threeSpaceFill {
00583     my $num = shift @_ || 0;
00584 
00585     if (length($num)<=1) {return "$num".'&nbsp;&nbsp;';}
00586     elsif (length($num)==2) {return "$num".'&nbsp;';}
00587     else {return "## ";}
00588 }
00589 sub round_score{
00590     return shift;
00591 }
00592 
00593 1;
